item.description:
Hi Meetup Members

This time, we organize a good opportunity to feel the oriental culture!!
There are good place to sing some songs(Japanese, Korean, etc...) in Boston.
It's a good opportunity to show your voice for everyone.
Of course, we can enjoy singing, dancing and drinking on the music!!
Would you like to spend a great time with us and your friends?

Where
DoReMi Karaoke
(442 Cambridge Street, Allston MA)
http://www.doremikara...

How
<Use subway : From Boston>
Take green Out Bound B Line, get off at Harvard Avenue Station,
come 2 blocks towards cambridge street, and take a left on cambridge street,
you will see that on your left hand side.

<Use your car : From Boston>
Take Storrow Drive West, get off at "Central Square",
turn left at the first set of lights, keep coming straight about 1 mile
and you will see that on your left hand side after the Mobil Gas Station.

Schedule
～20:30　Moving from Prudencial to DoReMi
20:30～22:30　Start this event

Etc
I’ll bring some snacks for appetizer.
If you are OK, please bring some drink.
(If you bring some alcohol, Please ask them before coming. I'm not sure whether they allow or not)
you are more than welcome to do so.

I’m looking forward to enjoying with Meetup members!!
Sincerely to you.
item.name: The Karaoke Meetup
